Html:
Hi there,

I completely new in QuickGraph, I just find it yesterday.

I'm trying to draw a Graph in PNG format using Graphviz.
I have follow the tutorial http://www.codeplex.com/quickgraph/Wiki/View.aspx?title=Visualization%20Using%20Graphviz&referringTitle=User%20Manual but I'm gettting the DOT file and not the PNG file.

I have google this question, but the only tutorial that I found was related to a older version.
Can you give me a hand?

muek
Once you have a .dot file, you can render it using the graphviz command line. You need to download graphviz tool from http://www.graphviz.org and follow their instructions.
